title: President Donald J. Trump Awards Nine Organizations with the Pledge to America’s Workers Presidential Award – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
September 23, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump awarded the inaugural Pledge to America’s Workers Presidential Awards to the following companies and trade associations for their excellence in workforce education and training:To date, the Pledge to America’s Workers touts over 440 signatories and over 16 million pledged opportunities for re-skilling and hiring.
